name: Sony CDXGT565UP Car Stereo Receivers with USB Input and Pandora Control

reviews.name: Sony CDXGT565UP Car Stereo Receivers with USB Input and Pandora Control
reviews.title: Car Stereo

reviews.name: Sony CDXGT565UP Car Stereo Receivers with USB Input and Pandora Control
reviews.reviewText:
I literally bought, installed, listened to, and returned every other car stereo at Best Buy before coming across this one. I'm a complete perfectionist where my car audio is concerned. I
have 2 amps(different), 1 sub box with 2-10in. subs(bridged), 2-6x9's. With the 2-preout setup on the deck, I want to run a RCA for the subs to the rear/sub preout and run 2-6x9's(amp'd) to the front preout. When I do this the 6x9's drown out the subs? So I fixed that by amping the 6 in. door speakers instead. I'm not quite sure why my sub is drown out when I want to amp up my 6x9's but if anyone has any idea's, please let me know.
Other than that this is the best sounding car receiver out of the newest Pioneer, Kenwood, and Sony stereo's!!
reviews.title: SOUNDS GREAT!!

reviews.name: Sony CDXGT565UP Car Stereo Receivers with USB Input and Pandora Control
reviews.reviewText: I have recently bought this radio and everything works great,but for some reason it will not keep time one minute it will have the right time and the next it won't but it keeps all my programed radio stations.I was wondering if someone could help me out and give me some suggestions as to why it loses time
reviews.title: CAR STEREO

reviews.name: Sony CDXGT565UP Car Stereo Receivers with USB Input and Pandora Control
reviews.reviewText: I love my new radio/cd player this product is awesome.
reviews.title: Awesome product, love it!

reviews.name: Sony CDXGT565UP Car Stereo Receivers with USB Input and Pandora Control
reviews.reviewText: Best gift my wife has given me! This head unit kicks a**! The customization and display is awesome, whats best than having great sounds, thats right, great looking display! I recommend this stereo, worth the buy!
reviews.title: Impressed! Awesome Head Unit!
